text:
In today’s lesson we are going to learn
English with the brand new romantic musical Cinderella.

The film is based on the fairy tale of the same name and stars
singer Camila Cabello as the title character in her acting debut.

Except the story isn't quite the same as the
fairy tale, so keep watching to find out why.

Just like Sana who says that she’s addicted to our channel
and has improved her listening as well as her speaking.

Because here at Learn English With TV Series we help you
to understand your favorite series and movies

without getting lost, without
missing the jokes and without subtitles.

So join our community of over 4.6 million learners by hiting
that subscribe button and bell down below now!

Do you feel lost and confused when
watching TV and don't have the subtitles?

Do you want to learn more native vocabulary and expressions
just like the ones you are learning in this lesson?

That is exactly why our Fluent with Friends
Course will be perfect for you!

We help you to learn the principles of connected speech,
so that you can understand natives at any speed.

You'll also learn thousands of the words we use in
every day speech and you will understand all the jokes.

The best part? You can try it absolutely
free with our 3-Part Masterclass!

Click here or in the description
box below to try it now!

I hope you had a good time 
learning English with Cinderella today

and if you did, I highly recommend
you check out this lesson next.
